    blood_analysis

    Calculate clone fate bias for specific cell type

    clone_fate_bias.Rd

    Calculate clone fate bias for specific cell type

    Usage

    clone_fate_bias(data, fate_use = "")

    Arguments

    data

    data.frame, indicating lineage tracing data, first column should be lineage tracing barcodes, second column should be related cell type

    fate_use

    character, targeted fate cell type. if fate_use == '', this function will automatically select clone dominant cell type.

    Examples

    clone_fate_bias(fate_test)
#> [1] "stromal cell"
#>            clone_name     fate_use clone_size         fate_ratio
#> I                   I stromal cell         12 0.0833333333333333
